name: Retired & Roaming
text: Friendly and willing to help

name: ray lambert
text: Great people and great service

name: Frank Jones
text: I've taken my boat to Leon for years. He's one of the most honest and dependable guy you'll ever meet. Great prices too.

name: Scott Barnett
text:
Good honest people....
Very knowledgeable of boats and boat motor service...!!!

name: Drew Thornton
text: Leon is a top notch guy. Really knows his stuff and tells you if it is worth fixing or not

name: Billy Mitchell
text: Great prices good work takes a little time to get ur work done but he's a small shop he is honest and up front I will be back if I have to

name: Justin Pace
text: Would like to properly review their work but after a month my boat still isn't fixed...I will not go back

name: Stephanie Andrews
text: Great service, great price on fixing my boat, no complaints what so ever. Even after we payed, he explained/showed what he done to fix the problem

name: Jason Doedoe
text: Great service great knowledgeable owner and mechanic. Always up front and honest. Will continue to use their services.

name: Philip Johnson
text: Ricky is is the best.  The work is done fast and complete.  Also,  let you know if there are other things that might be a problem down the road.

name: John Beebe
text: They have product. They have knowledgeable sales, service and parts people. They are there to help you when you need help.

name: Adam Jennings
text: Took a long time to repair, boat still doesn't run good

name: benthere123
text: Nice selection of new and used top tier boats for sale.  Very helpful staff.

name: adam anderlik
text: Drove in from West Florida and picked up a Consigned boat listed online and then discussed over the phone. Wanted to make sure all was known and agreed upon before I made an eight hour drive.  Boat was cleaner than I had hoped and Daniel was upfront and honest while discussing and negotiating over the phone. Paperwork was all prepared and accurate when I got there, so the close quick and easy. Not a bad thing to say and would not hesitate to work with them again.

name: Katherine Salom
text: We visit the service department at Blue Water Yacht sales quite often as they almost always have what we need to make repairs to our boat. If they don’t have what we need, they can get it for us pretty quickly. We will continue to come here to get whatever we need for our boat!

resp.text: Thanks Katherine.  We appreciate your business!

name: William Babcock
text: Great place

resp.text: Thanks William.  We appreciate your patronage!

name: kitespearo
text: Dealing with Forrest and his whole company was a pleasure. He communicated with us on a very timely manner. The whole deal was very easy and headache free. Even after the purchase of the boat he keeps in touch following up on the sales and experience. I would recommend to my friends and family 100%. if you are ever looking for a boat this is the company you want to deal with even when dealing out of state like we did.

name: Glenn Craft
text: Very good service. I took my 225 Yamaha to them because it would not idle. They repaired it an a couple other things I wanted done in just 1 week the other shop I took it to kept it for 3 weeks an didn’t fix the problem .  Just took out for a test run works like a new one.  I’m very satisfied.

name: kandie watson
text: Ok expensive

name: Dave Packett
text: Great people

name: Ernest Price
text: We were very  happy with our experience he is very  knowledgeable about  boats and repairs especially vintage boats

name: tim browning
text: Won't return calls when they tell you to leave a message

name: Gary Turner
text: If you like excuses as to why they did nothing, you'll get exactly what you want. If you actually want your boat repaired you have to stand over them the entire time, constantly calling and checking up daily will do nothing, you have to physically stand there the entire time or they don't do anything. It took me two months of daily calls to figure that out.

name: Jeff Clark
text: If they don't have it they can get it. Very knowledgeable mechanics for boats. Could be a museum with all the old stuff they have. This is not a marina but a repair shop.

name: Elizabeth Cooley
text:
Left the boat there two weeks for a repair that would take "one to two weeks". After not hearing anything, we called with no answer from the company, and decided to just drive up there to see what was going on.
He had made 0 progress toward repairing the boat. SOLD THE PROP OFF OUR BOAT TO SOMEONE ELSE! And emptied put 2 full gas cans that had been on the boat.
I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy. That is absolutely no way to do business, I don't see how they are still in business if this is how they treat their customers.

name: michelle connally
text: Very fine work

name: Scott Myers
text: Old school repair shop. No issues

name: SunShine Werner
text: Doug does such an amazing job repairing boats. He truly puts his all into it every single day. I've had the pleasure of meeting several satisfied customers:) Both Ray and Doug are both such hardworking, down to earth people. I recommend this place to anyone needing boat repair or maintenance 😁

name: robert martin
text: Helpfull .great service

name: Kevin Grider
text: Had what I needed but part had pice inside broke.

name: Eric D.
text: Great place if you're trying to restore an older boat.  Ray is an incredibly nice guy, and his prices are unbelievably reasonable.  I highly recommend this place for parts, trim, interior, electrical, trailer and hull related items.

name: Tom Pennington
text: Great place / New mechanic coming in and still have what you need with great service

resp.text: We appreciate your business and your review.

name: Sandra Sealy
text: If you have ever had a BAD DREAM this is an experience that was a bad dream. Please do not go to Rays Marine to have your boat worked on. If there was a 0 that is what I would give but there is not so I have to put 1.  My boat was robbed on the site of Rays Marine. Was promised to have fixed in one week. 3 weeks later no work done at all. Took parts off to fix other boats. Not a legit business at all. Roy Sealy

name: Sherri Schrimsher
text: I wish giving ZERO stars was an option but since it is not they get 1!!! We took our boat to Ray back in September of 2017, went weeks without a call from them.  Once we finally called to check the status they said they lost our number and didn't want to do the work without knowing someone was going to pay for it. Every time we have called since then they swore that they would have us ready in a week each time we called.  It is now May 18th and NO ONE HAS TOUCHED OUR BOAT TO MAKE THE REPAIRS after many promises that it would be done within a week!!! WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EXPERIENCE EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! If you want the work DONE in a timely manner DO NOT TAKE YOUR BOAT HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Jay Olko
text: Excellent service and help!

name: Tim Klassen
text: A really good last resort 🤣

resp.text: We are sorry if you had bad customer service. Thank you for your business and your review.

name: Scotty Mullins
text: It took nine months to fix my boat and when I showed up to get it no one was around after he said it was done. When I got back home with it my battery was the wrong one and the top was gone off it.  Plus, I had to put a freeze plug back in. So if you need your boat fixed do not go here, this is where boats go to die. PS I payed this man over 8 hundred dollars to let my boat set in the yard some more.

name: Skippy Bohanon
text: Not what i expected

name: Jason Willis
text: Ray is very knowledgeable and very fair to deal with.

name: Kenneth Bircheat
text: They have hard to find parts

name: Jessica Ginn Gulley
text: Great service, and they didnt charge alot.

name: Larry Mckay
text: They had the part we needed.  We had looked in 3 states for before we found them. Thanks for the help. Very large boat yard

name: Jay Lafferty
text: over a year to rebuild a motor,  over 100 phone calls checking on it. 25+different excuses,  it took me coming up with a sad story about someone dieing and me coming up there for a couple hours watching to get the half ass job done. i wouldn't recommend them to my worst enemy.

name: Dexter&Amy Osborne
text: Bad service and customer service sucks!

name: Alan Seidner
text: Honest knowledgable

name: Chuck Flanagan
text: Rays is awesome

resp.text: We appreciate your business and your review.

name: Jerrid Seiler
text: Sloppy setup but great people

resp.text: We appreciate your business and your review.

name: Erich Tackett
text: Not really a marine of much anymore

name: p-nut Cline
text: Got what I needed

name: Raymond Havard
text: Great deals on used parts. Bought a trim motor about 6 months ago and no problems. Saved me a ton of money

name: DAVID ROGERS
text: Worst service ever. Would not recommend to ANYONE!

name: Otis Burpo
text: Helpful, very helpful. Mike and David has been there not just for me, but with me also. The workers also, even the customers that comes in relays boating info that's very enlightening to one another!

name: Andrew Bettis
text: Very knowledgeable and reasonably priced

name: Brad Myrick
text: I called thinking my engine needed to be rebuilt because of low compression. The gentleman on the phone walked through everything on the engine with me and told my my engine did not need a rebuild and why it didn't. Very professional and knowledgeable. Thank you again for setting my mind and wallet at ease

name: Josh Vinson
text: These are some of the most knowledgeable, honest people in the world. Whether your looking for a used or new part for your boat or boat motor, they most likely have it or they'll find you one. They stand behind the parts they sale and the owner, Mr. David, knows more about outboard motors than any boat motor mechanic I've ever dealt with so if you need a part or just needing a question answered about your outboard, give them a shout. I know they'll be glad to help.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Josh! Mention your Google review next time you're shopping for a part for a special 10% discount!

name: Forward Observer
text: David, and crew are excellent! Great guys to work with. Fix anything on a boat!

name: rendon slade
text: These guys are awesome.

name: Sam Tate
text: The Guy there David is dishonest and not to be trusted do not take your boat there !!!!! Kept my boat for 3 weeks never authorized repairs but have 600.00 plus Bill. Took him to Court the Judge saw things my way will be going back to court for Court Cost see you soon. Already court order my Boat back to me see you real soon in Court again. No one at this place is a Certified Marine Mechanic I learned the hard way thank you Bill at Steal Creek Marine for fixing my Boat right and in a timely manner if you fool with back yard mechanics that's the type service you will receive don't find out the hard way like I did.

name: Bryan Burleson
text: Great customer service and great guys

name: Danny Miller
text: Excellent, great experience and great personal

name: sam weaver
text: Dont let the humble entrance fool you. Friendly, efficient, super fair prices and know their sht!

name: John Houston
text: These guys are liars and crooks!!!  I sent in a request a request on 5/19/18 to Daivd at outboard repair and salvage for him to honor a receipt for a 200 hp Mercury outboard motor. I had problems with it from day one.  They kept it for over a month and still wasn't fixed. I took it to Steel Creek Marine who is a certified Mercury outboard repair dealer.   They told me that it was not a 200 hp motor but a 150 hp. Big difference.  THAT'S FRAUD. He also said it had major problems and need to be rebuilt.  I have a written statement of the inspection.  So I spoke to David of Outboard Repair and Salvage.  He stated he would replace it.  I dropped of my boat to get the new motor exchanged.   I asked him to please have it fixed by the end of the week.  I called on that Friday and he said he was looking for one.  Then I called several times to see if the boat was ready but I got no answer.  I finally got someone to pic up on Friday 6/30/18. TWO WEEKS LATER!! They said David would have to call me back. He called back and left 2 messages. 1 saying he was still looking for a motor. Another saying that he found one and would have it ready by Monday which was 7/2. I have the recorded messages.  I called to check on it and the secretary now says it will be another week.  Unfortunately I have waited and waited and waited.  ITS NOW 7/21.  There seemes no concern in fixing this problem in a timely manner. I have lost time, money, vacation waiting for this problem to be corrected. I have missed 2 fishing rodeos that tickets were naught for including the Dauphin Island Deep Sea Fishing Rodeo. I have paid for not just tickets for the event but also for my brother I have not seen in 3 years way to get here to fish with him and my dad.  They dont seem to care the fraudulently sold me a wrong motor, that wasn't working either, nor trying to fix the problem in an expedient manner.

name: David Bryan
text: They always have what you need !

name: Mel Porter
text: Great and good own prices

resp.text: Thanks, Mel! Let us know if we can be of any more help.

name: David Hosey
text: Great people that go the extra mile to help you

name: Evon Parker
text: The place to go

name: joe clark
text: Poor customer service. I've been lied to for over a month while my boat has been there. I'll never deal with them again

name: Lisa Allen
text: He is very good at his job

resp.text: Thank you Lisa for the review and your business!

name: Allan Crow
text: Went to get AC fixed on wife's car spent nearly 700 dollars on it and still didn't fix so I want carry anything else to them

name: Michael Goodson
text: Never did the work when they said they would, took car somewhere else.

name: Joseph Piper
text: The people are very friendly

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating!!!

name: Eric Davis
text: I don't trust my vehicle to anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you Eric for the review and your business!

name: Carla Mitchell
text: Very friendly guys there. It didn't take too long to have my oil changed.

resp.text: Thank you Carla for the review and your business!

name: Jonathan Bottomlee
text: Brad is an honest, friendly guy and always does a great job.

resp.text: Thank you Jonathan for the review and your business!

name: Mary E Mullins
text: Awesome place to have your car service! Very knowledgeable! Excellent  customer service!

resp.text: Thank you Mary for the review and your business!

name: Teresa Ellenburg
text: They were very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you Teresa for the review and your business!

name: Jonathan Bottomlee
text: Really good and knowledgeable vehicle service professionals.

resp.text: Thank you Jonathan for the review and your business!

name: Troy Blair
text: I utilize him to maintain our Fleet at Custom Pest Control.  Honest Dependable.  Sometimes there is a wait to get worked on but it's because he's a great Mechanic and everyone wants to use him.  Worth the wait.

name: Amanda Blythe
text: Good work, fast service. Friendly staff.

resp.text: Thank you Amanda for the review and your business!

name: Richie Kiraly
text: Great place!!!!    I highly recommend!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Richie for the review and your business!

name: McRATT
text: Long time friend and a damn good mechanic.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and your business!

name: Robert Nesbit
text:
Always Professional, Always Fair.
He is a GoodOleBoy!
They diagnose the issues with up to date equipment and resolves them.
Has ASE Certified technicians who also are GoodOleBoys, that are professional, polite and customer friendly.
Shop is always kept clean & organized.
Will only use Brad Bearden Automotive Repair for my vehicle repairs!

resp.text: Thank you Robert for the review and the great words about our shop!

name: Misty Schaffer
text: Brad and the team are very honest and professionals at handling your car and great to do business with them. They are fast, clean, and reasonable priced. Call or go by and see them.

resp.text: Thank you Misty for the kind words about our staff. We appreciate your business.

name: Laurel Felipe
text: Cheapest oil change and honest work. Usually the least expensive estimates but even if he isn't the work is going to be done right and I know that so I only use this mechanic.

resp.text: Thank you Laurel for the review! We appreciate your business!

name: Neophyter *
text: Excellent clutch work on my Chevy S10.  Fair priced for quality work.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and your business!

name: bobbie gomez
text: Excellent workmanship. Knowledgeable mechanics.

resp.text: Thank you Bobbie for the review and your business!

name: Cash Von Esper
text: Took two weeks, to get my truck back that they were suppose to get to in two days, didn't put my console completely back together, made my truck think that the E brake was activated, when it was not. They broke my battery terminals, and didn't replace them, also my starter went out, was late getting to work because of the work they told me they had finished was not completed.

name: Aaron Taft
text: Over charged for parts,Did shady work, rebuilt transmission and still leaks after a return visit.Damaged parts. Didn't do work as requested. I do not trust this man and would not recommend him to anyone.Beware of his reviews, he ask friends and family to write good reviews.

name: roger baldwin
text: Good people and great service will always take my vehicle there for repair!

resp.text: Thank you Roger for the review and your business!

name: Mike Vandergriff
text: Brad and his guys know their stuff. You will get the same quality work as the dealerships at a lower price.

resp.text: Thank you Mike for the review. We appreciate your business.

name: Joshua Jackson
text: Great mechanics here & very trustworthy. They also do routine maintenance.

name: Joe Millican
text: Really good people there they will treat you right..

name: MICHELLE SIMPSON
text: Charged me $108.00 in labor to replace a main fuse and swap a battery in my truck. I've watched videos that said it should take no longer than 15 minutes at max to replace the  fuse and 10 minutes for the battery at max.  They charged my husband over $400.00 to replace his alternator and check his catelac converter.  WILL NOT BE DOING BUSINESS WITH THEM EVER AGAIN!!!!!!!

name: john ware
text: Do great work on your car and great customer service and support

name: Jason Baugh
text: Great service, fast and knowledgeable

resp.text: Thank you Jason for the review and your business!

name: Heath Williams
text: Great place for mechanic work

resp.text: Thank you Heath for the review and your business!

name: Katie Pennington
text: Took my car in took 3 days and kept coming up with excuses.  Did not fix right took back took 4 days and kept making up excuses. Got vehicle back and had to replace parts that they screwed up.  I was out $200 on labor and 7 days without my vehicle to fix absolutely nothing.  Thanks for nothing Brad Bearden.

name: Kay Alexander
text: Be sure to get your antifreeze checked before the big freeze hits!!

name: T Morgan
text: AAA+ Service!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and your business!

name: Will Lynn
text: He is the only mechanic that I trust.

resp.text: Thank you Will for the review and putting your trust in us!

text: Great folks

resp.text: Thank you James for the review and your business!

text: You can trust Bearden Automotive with you automotive needs.
